**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 157 1.1 --- You permanently mutate to become more like the creatures of your bloodline. You gain the appropriate trait or traits for those types of creatures ([aberration](/Traits.aspx?ID=523) for aberrant, [angel](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=359) and [celestial](/Traits.aspx?ID=551) for angelic, [demon](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=387) and [fiend](/Traits.aspx?ID=600) for demonic, and so on). You gain low-light vision or darkvision, if one is appropriate for creatures with those traits. Choose one of the following.
  • If the creatures associated with your bloodline have the ability to [fly](/Actions.aspx?ID=2312), you gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed.
  • If the creatures associated with your bloodline are [aquatic](/Traits.aspx?ID=533) or [amphibious](/Traits.aspx?ID=529), you become amphibious, able to breathe water and air equally well, and you gain a [swim](/Actions.aspx?ID=2381) Speed equal to your land Speed.
  • If creatures associated with your bloodline have a resistance or immunity to [acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=524), [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=555), [electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=586), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604), [void](/Traits.aspx?ID=510), or [sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=697),choose an energy type your bloodline is immune or resistant to and gain resistance 20 against that energy type.
name: Bloodline Mutation
